title: Maryland
prompt: A weathered wooden clinic sign reading a county name, mounted on a post along a quiet two-lane road cutting through rolling Appalachian hills at golden hour; bare or early-spring trees frame the scene, with a pickup truck visible in soft focus on the road ahead, and the distant ridge line catching warm amber lightâ€”shot in documentary photojournalism style with muted greens and browns, conveying isolation and quiet determination rather than hardship.
